dct_title_s: Road map of Sri Lanka. Drawn and printed by Survey Department. (North sheet)
dct_description_sm: Printed on both sides of sheet. Relief shown by spot heights. Includes 8 local route maps, table of "Trunk routes," road signs, distance chart, and index map. Section 1 on recto covers northern Sri Lanka ; Section 2 on verso covers southern Sri Lanka.
